title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checked state of the table is not being updated immediately after making a selection.
EB: It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during the update process.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the table with checkboxes.
3. Make a selection.
4. Observe that the checked state of the table is not updated immediately.
5. Wait for about 30 seconds.
6. Observe that the checked state of the table is eventually updated. A busy cursor should be shown during this update process.
